amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: Nos. 5, 10, 11, 14, 19, 20, 24, 28, 30, 40, 42, 45, 46, and 43 printed in House Report 110-666 and printed on pages H4781-H4784 of the Congressional Record dated May 22, 2008.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: 5, 10, 11, 14, 19, 20, 24, 28, 30, 40, 42, 45, 46, and 43 printed in House Report 110-666.

action.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendments (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
